basic.floral_language:
Dypsis lutescens 
Floriography: tenacity, beautiful and graceful 
Dypsis lutescens is from the tropics, and its appearance has a tropical taste. 
It is evergreen four seasons. Stem does not internodes, leaves are narrow, lanceolate. Looked from a distance, the tail is like a natural spread out. It is often used to decorate the place such as living room, bedroom and study room. Bamboo palm likes half overcast environment. Avoid directly bright light. Two to three hours sunlight in winter. When condition is appropriate, it may also can blossom in May. Flower color is yellow.
basic.blooming: Foliage plants, often flowers in May, yellow flowers

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, in winter may take 2-3h sunlight
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly in spring and autumn
